messages.title: Who will deliver a recovery that helps you get on in life?
The Conservative plan for Britain: brutal cuts to vital local services.
messages.content: George Osborne is making no secret of the Conservatives' plan to cut services deeper and faster if they get a chance to do that.

messages.title: The Liberal Democrats will borrow less than Labour and cut less than the Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems will finish the job of balancing the books fairly, and on time, by 2018, while protecting the vital services we all rely on. They will ensure everyone benefits from the recovery, not just those at the top, by cutting Income Tax by a further Â£400 for ordinary workers.
Opposed Conservative plans cutting nurseries, schools, and colleges under threat.
